page.title: 03SHOPPING AT GATLEY, CHEADLE.
page.content: WE CARRIED OUT OUR OWN SHOPPING SURVEY IN GATLEY AND FOUND MORE PEOPLE VISITED THE SUPERMARKETS THAN ANY OTHER SHOPS.GATEWAY, WHICH IS OPPOSITE THE PUB THE PRINCE OF WALES, HAS MORE CUSTOMERS IN THE MORNING THAN THE AFTERNOON AND IS ABOUT TWICE AS BUSY AS THE CO-OP. VERY FEW PEOPLE VISIT SHOPS SUCH AS THE FIREPLACE CENTRE BECAUSE PEOPLE ONLY NEED ONE FIREPLACE, BUT A LOT OF PEOPLE GO TO THE FOOD SHOPS EVERY DAY. THE PEOPLE WHO DO NOT ALWAYS SHOP IN GATLEY EITHER GO TO STOCKPORT AR WILMSLOW AND A VERY FEW GO TO MANCHESTER. NEARLY ALL PEOPLE WALK TO GATLEY AND THINK GATLEY SHOPPING CENTRE IS VERY CONVENIENT. THEY LIKE MEETING THEIR FRIENDS AND THINK THE SHOP KEEPERS ARE VERY FRIENDLY.
